features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy; Articulated patterning for mobility
Dryride two-layer fabric[10,000mm/5,000g]is highly breathable and quick drying, PFC-free DWR coating
Critically-taped seams lock out the elements
Thermacore insulation[100g]for focused warmth and enhanced breathability; Taffeta lining mapped with microfleece back panel for additional warmth
Contour hood is helmet compatible and features an elastic hood gaiter and crown adjustment
Room-to-Grow system extends the length of the legs and sleeves by 1.5in to keep up with growth spurts
Anti-scuff cuffs with hook-and-loop cuff elevators, Adjustable sleeve cuffs, Water-resistant boot gaiter, Glove loops, Ticket O-ring
Back pockets with hook-and-loop closure, chest pockets with hook-and-loop closure, therma-pocket with media port, zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets, and zippered sleeve pass pocket
